## Platform Name

Which platform do you want to add? (e.g., Twitter, LinkedIn, Discord)

## Why This Platform?

Explain why this platform would be valuable for the project.

## Platform Characteristics

### API/Automation Access

- Does the platform have an API?
- Can it be automated with browser automation (Playwright)?
- Are there rate limits?
- Are there authentication requirements?

### Community Guidelines

- What are the platform's rules about automation?
- Are there restrictions on automated posting?
- What are the spam policies?

### Technical Considerations

- Character limits
- Post format (text, images, threads, etc.)
- Rate limiting rules
- Engagement metrics

## Personalization Needs

What aspects of writing style are unique to this platform?

- Tone differences
- Format differences (hashtags, mentions, etc.)
- Length constraints
- Cultural norms
